channel.title: Rogue Agents - A Division 2 Podcast
channel.description: Our goal is to cover everything Division 2 on a weekly basis. From the Base of Operations to each Darkzone and every safe house along the way.
channel.author: Media Junkie
channel.itunes:author: Media Junkie
channel.itunes:summary: Our goal is to cover everything Division 2 on a weekly basis. From the Base of Operations to each Darkzone and every safe house along the way.

item.title: Episode #30 - Season 1 Recap
item.description:
For the final episode of season 1 the agents get together and look back at the past twenty-nine episodes. We’d love to hear what you guys favorite moments in our discord or on twitter!
Join the Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids
Gaming Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes)
Media Junkie Podcast Fanboy Fight Club Gimmick Minute

item.title: Episode 29 - TU6/Episode 2 Review
item.description:
With TU6 and Episode 2 being out for a while we do our best to review the latest content drop. We then look into our crystal ball to predict the future of the Division 2. *Season 1 will be ending with the next episode! See you in the winter*
Join the Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids
Gaming Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes)
Media Junkie Podcast Fanboy Fight Club Gimmick Minute

item.title: Episode #28 - Too Early to Mourn
item.description:
Well the community is definitely split, is the Division 2 Dead or Alive? We don’t so much care because there’s new content! We talk about Episode 2 and get ready for what’s to come. Join the Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids
Gaming Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes) Deadman24 (Jason) Media Junkie Podcast Fanboy Fight Club Gimmick Minute

item.title: Episode #27 - Title Update 6: PvP & Weapon Changes
item.description: *Sorry for the audio* Since the last show there was two huge "State of the Game" eipsodes and we cover both of them. The first half of the show is about Darkzone Incentives and changes to conflict which we give our opinion if these changes went far enough to get us back in the DZ. The second half were cover some of the biggest changes coming to TU6 by far. From talents to weapons there's so many changes to get you excited. Join the Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids Gaming Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes) Deadman24 (Jason) Media Junkie Podcast Fanboy Fight Club Gimmick Minute

item.title: Episode #26 - Massive Hype
item.description:
We’re back and extremely excited to discuss the State of the Game from September 11th. From gear sets to targeted loot there’s so many changes and they are all welcomed. Remember we’re on a bi-weekly schedule we’ll be back in two week. In that time don’t forget to: Join the Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids

item.title: Episode #25 - Agents Anonymous
item.description:
This week is give our feedback on Inventory Management as well as much needed therapy session. *Reminder* After this episode the show will be changing to a bi weekly schedule so you wont get a show next monday, but instead the following Monday we’ll back back. Feel free to check out the other shows at that time.
Join The Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz

item.title: Episode #24 - You down with PVP
item.description:
We’re back with another feedback session and this time it’s PvP. For us PVP has been an area of contention so we don’t hold anything back. As always feel free to join our discord and let’s us know what you think.

item.title: Episode #23 - It’s The End Game
item.description:
Strap in agents we’re in the Endgame and massive wants to know joke it can be improved. From recalibration to crafting we discuss our thoughts on what needs to be changed! Here’s the reddit thread if you’d like to answer those questions for Massive > http://bit.ly/2z5nBYd
Join The Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids

item.title: Episode #22 - Loot 2.0 Feedback
item.description:
Massive is collection info on Loot Acquisition with a set of survey questions. This week we answer them and share our feedback on how Loot 2.0 can work. Make sure you give your feedback here bit.ly/2yXkPnu We also announce September we will be going bi weekly to insure we’re giving you the best podcast we can.
Join The Discord https://discord.gg/RrzffUz
Follow Us Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids
Subscribe YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids

item.title: Episode #20 - Be Kind and Have Fun
item.description:
After a long anticipated wait Title Update 5 and Episode 1 is finally here. This week discuss some of the bugs mentioned in State of the Game and our high level experience with Episode 1 content. *No spoilers* Also its a bit of a. Celebration as we made it to twenty episodes.

item.title: Episode #19 - Sherbet Reward System
item.description:
On the eve of TU 5 and Episode 1 discuss a few more details of what’s to come. We also get to spend some time speaking with Mason (PHXgaming) about his experience with the PTS.

item.title: *Bonus* Episode 1 - 90’s Animated Remake
item.description:
This week the fanboys discuss Mulan, the new 007 casting choice, and The Little Mermaid. The Lion King remake comes out this Friday July 19th and that got the fanboys thinking. Thus, for the Main event, Wes, Mike and Jarmar argue what animated property from 90's they would bring back for a live action movie or tv show! Who will win?
Do you also have an opinion about all things in the media? Want to argue why your idea is better? Then join the Media Junkie discord! Interact with all the fanboys and have fun! To join, please click: https://discord.gg/j3qpcNU Media Junkie Social Media: Twitter & Instagram: @MediaJunkieVids Youtube: YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch: Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids Discord: https://discord.gg/j3qpcNU

item.title: Episode #18 - Patiently, Waiting!
item.description: We have a date for Episode 1 & Title Update 5! For the Year One Pass holders it nearly a week away. With it brings quite a bit of changes and a lot more content. item.title: Episode #17 - Jake Be Our Friend
item.description:
4th of July and Stranger Things may have pulled away our attention for a little bit, But we are extremely excited for TU5 and Episode 1. We discuss July 3rd State of the Game, the Division Netflix Movie and more. For a full list of changes follow the link -> bit.ly/2S2Anzp
MediaJunkie Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes)

item.title: Episode #16 - Quest & PTS
item.description:
We’re back with a jammed pack episode after our first week off! Joined by fellow agent Jason, we share our experiences from the past two weeks and cover June 26th State of The Game.
MediaJunkie Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes) Deadman24 (Jason)

item.title: Episode #15 - Number One Gunner
item.description:
This week the agents go hands on with the help of a special guest. Mason (PHXgaming) shares his hands on experience with TU4. We talk about the new Gunner Specialization, Skill Tree Changes, and new exotic gear. Also they recap Ubi’s E3 Division 2 drop.
MediaJunkie Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids Agents Thundacatz06 (Jarmar) DementedWes (Wes) PHXgaming (Mason)

item.title: Episode #14 - The Tip of Title Update 4
item.description:
This week we discuss a couple changes in TU 3.1, scratch the surface of TU4 and concluded the Journey to the Nemesis. Title Update 3.1 Full Patch Notes bit.ly/2WdNyOp

item.title: Episode #13 - All The Fixins
item.description:
This week the Main Mission is all about May 29th “State of The Game”, Title Update 4 News and all the fixes coming in Title Update 3.1. They also talk about their experiences from the week and lastly the Journey to getting the Nemesis.
MediaJunkie Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkieVids

item.title: Episode #11 - Truly Dark Hours
item.description: This week has been controversial to say the least. we received title 3 update and the 8 man raid, Operation: Dark Hours. We share our opinions on the two and where the game should go from here.

item.title: Episode #8 - Picking Apart The PTS
item.description:
A new agent has joined our group... Hot off his trending reddit post breaking down PTS Title Update 3, Mason Aka PHXGaming, joins Rogue Agents this week to share his thoughts and analysis of the upcoming update.

item.description:

item.title: Episode #6 - Massive says “Just Relax”
item.description:
Last week, accompanied with Invasion: Battle for DC, Title Update 2.0 was released and changed quite a bit. This sent social media to a rightful roar. We discuss Massive response and if we’re on board.
Twitter & Instagram @MediaJunkieVids YT.com/MediaJunkie Twitch.tv/MediaJunkie

item.title: Gimmick Minute Episode #1 - Welcome to the Family
item.description: This episode breaks down Wrestlemania as well as the Raw and Smackdown that followed it, My opinions are my own Feel free to agree or disagree with them.
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: This episode breaks down Wrestlemania as well as the Raw and Smackdown that followed it, My opinions are my own Feel free to agree or disagree with them.

item.title: Episode #5 - It’s not painful. Just not sure it feels good.
item.description: Invasion: Battle for D.C drops this week and makes us feel all sorts of ways. We discuss the changes and how they affect us as well as how much did we enjoy the new Stronghold.
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: Invasion: Battle for D.C drops this week and makes us feel all sorts of ways. We discuss the changes and how they affect us as well as how much did we enjoy the new Stronghold.

item.title: Episode #4 - It’s not you.. It’s me!
item.description: This week we talk Endgame, Patch 1.07, Tidal Basin Update and our experience in the Darkzone! Our guest agent is a fellow Media Junkie member, Jason.
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk Endgame, Patch 1.07, Tidal Basin Update and our experience in the Darkzone! Our guest agent is a fellow Media Junkie member, Jason.

item.title: Episode #3 - State of the Game
item.description: This episode we have our first ever guest Agent. He helps discuss the recent “State of The Game” release by Massive.
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: This episode we have our first ever guest Agent. He helps discuss the recent “State of The Game” release by Massive.

item.title: Episode #2 - Confirmation of the Hype
item.description: Roughly a week into Division 2, Did it live up to the hype? How are we liking the new systems? What are some stand out moments? Find out when we go rogue!
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: Roughly a week into Division 2, Did it live up to the hype? How are we liking the new systems? What are some stand out moments? Find out when we go rogue!

item.title: Episode #1 - Calm before the Storm
item.description: We discuss our levels of hype, share some concern and express our expectations. With less than 72hr until launch. We go rouge!
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
item.itunes:summary: We discuss our levels of hype, share some concern and express our expectations. With less than 72hr until launch. We go rouge!

item.title: The Intro & Outro
item.description: This podcast will be covering all things Division 2. It’s been a long wait, but we’re only a few days away. Agents get ready to go rouge!
item.dc:creator: Media Junkie
